process.description: TCP4-2132 Verify file upload using record list loops and nested screen
process.name: TCP4-2132 Verify file upload using record list loops and nested screen
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:laneSet id="node_2">
      <bpmn:lane id="node_3" name="">
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_5</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_6</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>
      <bpmn:lane id="node_4" name="">
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_7</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_8</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>
    </bpmn:laneSet>
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_5" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_6" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="788" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_12</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_7" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="788" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_12</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_14</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_8" name="End Event" pm:screenRef="">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_14</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_6"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_12" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_7"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_14" sourceRef="node_7" targetRef="node_8"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_1" name="Pool" processRef="ProcessId"/>
  </bpmn:collaboration>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="collaboration_0">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="115" y="170" width="585" height="446"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="144.9999999999995" y="170.00000000000085" width="555.0000000000005" height="219.9999999999992"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="144.99999999999955" y="389.9999999999992" width="555.0000000000005" height="226.0000000000008"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="210" y="200" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <dc:Bounds x="270" y="260" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <dc:Bounds x="350" y="440" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <dc:Bounds x="580" y="490" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <di:waypoint x="228" y="218"/>
        <di:waypoint x="328" y="298"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_12_di" bpmnElement="node_12">
        <di:waypoint x="328" y="298"/>
        <di:waypoint x="408" y="478"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_14_di" bpmnElement="node_14">
        <di:waypoint x="408" y="478"/>
        <di:waypoint x="598" y="508"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
